title: On track to invest up to $10 billion in India over 3-5 years: Bain Capital's David Gross
description: "India's time has come both due to its own internal development and hard work of structural improvements over the years," said David Gross, managing partner, Asia, Bain Capital.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
